question: Which of the following is NOT a banned word from 2014?

question: How many licks does it take to get to the center of a Tootsie Pop? (According to Science.)

question: What is the name of this 8x NL batting Champ and long time Pittsburgh Pirate manager?
ans1: Johannes Peter "Honus" Wagner aka "The Flying Dutchman"
cont: Honus' older brother, Albert, also a major leaguer, was nicknamed "Butts". I kid you not.
